remarks: Ordering property for complex exponentiation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
recxpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
recxpcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
recxpcld.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cxple2ad.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
cxple2ad.5 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ C ) $.
cxple2ad.6 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
cxple2ad $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^c C ) <_ ( B ^c C ) ) $.
